verses.name: Mark 7:22
verses.text: Thefts, covetousness, wickedness, deceit, lasciviousness, an evil eye, blasphemy, pride, foolishness:

verses.name: Mark 7:23
verses.text: All these evil things come from within, and defile the man.

verses.name: Mark 7:24
verses.text: And from thence he arose, and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon, and entered into an house, and would have no man know it: but he could not be hid.

verses.name: Mark 7:25
verses.text: For a certain woman, whose young daughter had an unclean spirit, heard of him, and came and fell at his feet:

verses.name: Mark 7:26
verses.text: The woman was a Greek, a Syrophenician by nation; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter.
